## ⚠️ AI Notice - Important!

We encourage contributors to use AI tools responsibly when creating Pull Requests. While AI can be a valuable aid, it is essential to ensure that your contributions:
- Meet the task requirements
- Build successfully (`npm run build`)
- Pass linter checks (`npx biome check .`)

Submissions that do not meet these standards may be closed without warning. Please take the time to understand the changes you are proposing and their impact.
